Uses of Class
camzup.core.Knot2

Packages that use Knot2 
Package Description
camzup.core  

  • Uses of Knot2 in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return Knot2 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Knot2 Knot2.adoptForeHandle​(Knot2 source)
    Adopts the fore handle of a source knot.
    Knot2 Knot2.adoptHandles​(Knot2 source)
    Adopts the fore handle and rear handle of a source knot.
    Knot2 Knot2.adoptRearHandle​(Knot2 source)
    Adopts the rear handle of a source knot.
    Knot2 Knot2.alignHandles()
    Aligns this knot's handles in the same direction while preserving their magnitude.
    Knot2 Knot2.alignHandlesBackward()
    Aligns this knot's fore handle to its rear handle while preserving magnitude.
    Knot2 Knot2.alignHandlesForward()
    Aligns this knot's rear handle to its fore handle while preserving magnitude.
    Knot2 Knot2.AbstrEasing.apply​(Knot2 origin, Knot2 dest, java.lang.Float step, Knot2 target)
    A clamped interpolation between the origin and destination.
    abstract Knot2 Knot2.AbstrEasing.applyUnclamped​(Knot2 origin, Knot2 dest, float step, Knot2 target)
    The interpolation to be defined by subclasses.
    Knot2 Knot2.Lerp.applyUnclamped​(Knot2 origin, Knot2 dest, float step, Knot2 target)
    Eases between two knots by a step using the formula (1.0 - t) * a + t * b .
    static Knot2 Curve2.eval​(Curve2 curve, float step, Knot2 target)
    Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] , returning a knot on the curve.
    static Knot2 CurveEntity2.eval​(CurveEntity2 ce, int curveIndex, float step, Knot2 knWorld, Knot2 knLocal)
    Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] for a curve in the entity, returning a knot.
    static Knot2 Curve2.evalFirst​(Curve2 curve, Knot2 target)
    Evaluates the first knot in the curve.
    static Knot2 Curve2.evalLast​(Curve2 curve, Knot2 target)
    Evaluates the last knot in the curve.
    static Knot2 Knot2.fromSegCatmull​(float xPrevAnchor, float yPrevAnchor, float xCurrAnchor, float yCurrAnchor, float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, float xAdvAnchor, float yAdvAnchor, float tightness, Knot2 prev, Knot2 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of a Catmull-Rom curve.
    static Knot2 Knot2.fromSegCatmull​(Vec2 prevAnchor, Vec2 currAnchor, Vec2 nextAnchor, Vec2 advAnchor, float tightness, Knot2 prev, Knot2 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of a Catmull-Rom curve.
    static Knot2 Knot2.fromSegCubic​(float xPrevControl, float yPrevControl, float xNextControl, float yNextControl, float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, Knot2 prev, Knot2 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of a cubic curve.

    Assumes that the previous knot's coordinate is set to the first anchor point.
    static Knot2 Knot2.fromSegCubic​(Vec2 prevControl, Vec2 nextControl, Vec2 nextAnchor, Knot2 prev, Knot2 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of a cubic curve.
    static Knot2 Knot2.fromSegCubicRefl​(float xNextControl, float yNextControl, float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, Knot2 prev, Knot2 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of a cubic curve which reflect an existing segment.

    Assumes that the previous knot's coordinate is set to the first anchor point.
    static Knot2 Knot2.fromSegCubicRefl​(Vec2 nextControl, Vec2 nextAnchor, Knot2 prev, Knot2 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of a cubic curve which reflect an existing segment.

    Assumes that the previous knot's coordinate is set to the first anchor point.
    static Knot2 Knot2.fromSegLinear​(float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, Knot2 prev, Knot2 next)
    Sets a knot from a line segment.
    static Knot2 Knot2.fromSegLinear​(Vec2 nextAnchor, Knot2 prev, Knot2 next)
    Sets a knot from a line segment.
    static Knot2 Knot2.fromSegQuadratic​(float xControl, float yControl, float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, Knot2 prev, Knot2 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of the quadratic curve.
    static Knot2 Knot2.fromSegQuadratic​(Vec2 control, Vec2 nextAnchor, Knot2 prev, Knot2 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of a quadratic curve.
    Knot2 Curve2.get​(int i)
    Gets a knot from the curve by an index.
    Knot2 Curve2.getFirst()
    Gets the first knot in the curve.
    Knot2 Curve2.getLast()
    Gets the last knot in the curve.
    Knot2 Knot2.mirrorHandles()
    Mirrors this knot's handles.
    Knot2 Knot2.mirrorHandlesBackward()
    Sets the forward-facing handle to mirror the rear-facing handle: the fore will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the rear.
    Knot2 Knot2.mirrorHandlesForward()
    Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
    static Knot2 Knot2.mix​(Knot2 origin, Knot2 dest, float step, Knot2 target, Knot2.AbstrEasing easingFunc)
    Mixes two knots together by a step in [0.0, 1.0] with the help of an easing function.
    static Knot2 Knot3.project​(Knot3 source, Mat4 projection, Mat4 camera, Knot2 target, Vec4 coPromoted, Vec4 fhPromoted, Vec4 rhPromoted)
    Projects a 3D knot to a 2D knot.
    Knot2 Knot2.relocate​(Vec2 v)
    Relocates the knot to a new location while maintaining the relationship between the central coordinate and its two handles.
    Knot2 Curve2.removeAt​(int i)
    Returns and removes a knot at a given index.
    Knot2 Curve2.removeFirst()
    Returns and removes the first knot in the curve.
    Knot2 Curve2.removeLast()
    Removes and returns the last knot in the curve.
    Knot2 Knot2.reverse()
    Reverses the knot's direction by swapping the fore- and rear-handles.
    Knot2 Knot2.rotateForeHandle​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot's fore handle by an angle in radians.
    Knot2 Knot2.rotateForeHandle​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates this knot's fore handle by the cosine and sine of an angle.
    Knot2 Knot2.rotateHandles​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot's fore and rear handles by an angle in radians.
    Knot2 Knot2.rotateHandles​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates this knot's fore and rear handles by the cosine and sine of an angle.
    Knot2 Knot2.rotateRearHandle​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot's rear handle by an angle in radians.
    Knot2 Knot2.rotateRearHandle​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates this knot's rear handle by the cosine and sine of an angle.
    Knot2 Knot2.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot around the z axis by an angle in radians.
    Knot2 Knot2.rotateZ​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates this knot around the z axis.
    Knot2 Knot2.scale​(float scale)
    Scales this knot by a factor.
    Knot2 Knot2.scale​(Vec2 scale)
    Scales this knot by a non-uniform scalar.
    Knot2 Knot2.scaleForeHandleBy​(float scalar)
    Scales the fore handle by a factor.
    Knot2 Knot2.scaleForeHandleTo​(float magnitude)
    Scales the fore handle to a magnitude.
    Knot2 Knot2.scaleHandlesBy​(float scalar)
    Scales both the fore and rear handle by a factor.
    Knot2 Knot2.scaleHandlesTo​(float magnitude)
    Scales both the fore and rear handle to a magnitude.
    Knot2 Knot2.scaleRearHandleBy​(float scalar)
    Scales the rear handle by a factor.
    Knot2 Knot2.scaleRearHandleTo​(float magnitude)
    Scales the rear handle to a magnitude.
    Knot2 Knot2.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord)
    Sets the coordinate, fore and rear handles to the input coordinate.
    Knot2 Knot2.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord, float xFore, float yFore)
    Sets the knot's coordinates and fore handle.
    Knot2 Knot2.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord, float xFore, float yFore, float xRear, float yRear)
    Sets the knot's coordinate, forehandle and rearhandle by component.
    Knot2 Knot2.set​(Knot2 source)
    Sets this knot from a source knot.
    Knot2 Knot2.set​(Vec2 coord)
    Sets the coordinate, fore- and rear-handles to the input coordinate.
    Knot2 Knot2.set​(Vec2 coord, Vec2 foreHandle)
    Sets the knot's coordinates and fore handle.
    Knot2 Knot2.set​(Vec2 coord, Vec2 foreHandle, Vec2 rearHandle)
    Sets this knot from a series of vectors.
    static Knot2 Knot2.smoothHandles​(Knot2 prev, Knot2 curr, Knot2 next, Vec2 carry)
    Smoothes the handles of a knot with reference to a previous and next knot.
    static Knot2 Knot2.smoothHandlesFirst​(Knot2 curr, Knot2 next, Vec2 carry)
    Smoothes the fore handle of the first knot in an open curve.
    static Knot2 Knot2.smoothHandlesLast​(Knot2 prev, Knot2 curr, Vec2 carry)
    Smoothes the rear handle of the last knot in an open curve.
    Knot2 Knot2.transform​(Mat3 m)
    Multiplies this knot by a matrix.
    Knot2 Knot2.transform​(Transform2 tr)
    Multiplies this knot by a transform.
    Knot2 Knot2.translate​(Vec2 v)
    Translates this knot by a vector.
    Methods in camzup.core that return types with arguments of type Knot2 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Iterator<Knot2> Curve2.iterator()
    Returns an iterator, which allows an enhanced for-loop to access the knots in a curve.

    Compares this knot to another based on a comparison between coordinates.

    static Vec2 Knot2.foreDir​(Knot2 knot, Vec2 target)
    Gets the fore handle of a knot as a direction, rather than as a point.
    static float Knot2.foreMag​(Knot2 knot)
    Returns the magnitude of the knot's fore handle, i.e., the Euclidean distance between the fore handle and the coordinate.
    static Vec2 Knot2.foreVec​(Knot2 knot, Vec2 target)
    Gets the fore handle of a knot as a vector, rather than as a point.
